item.title: The Spring Security Oauth Blues - Simplicity
item.description: I personally like the Spring Framework and its Security components, because it’s pretty full-featured and easy to use, but when it comes to Spring Security OAuth, there’s a huge quality breakdown. In this (probably series) of blogposts, I’ll try to sum up to good, the bad and the evil, and why i ended up completely dropping Spring Security OAuth2.
